recipesJson.name: Creme Brulee
recipesJson.author: xXxLEONIDASxXx
recipesJson.description: VT Creme Brulee, FLV Brulee and WF Caramel Butter are the power trio in this group combining to bring your brulee base, caramel notes and caramlized sugar essence.  Toss in some FA Custard Premium to bring the dense, buttery egginess and a dense mouthfeel.
